message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it can significantly enhance your experience and productivity. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $150. I hope you find this offer attractive and look forward to your positive response.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you consider reducing the price to $120? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate. However, I must maintain a reasonable margin for myself. I am proposing to sell the product to you for $140. This price reflects the value I place on the product while allowing me to ensure a fair return for my efforts. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a final offer of $130 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation and allows us to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your effort to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $135 for the product. This price reflects the value I place on the product while also considering your budgetary constraints. I believe this to be a fair compromise that will allow us to conclude this transaction satisfactorily.
